data.comment: Today's referee, Erik Lambrechts, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Erik Lambrechts, has blown to start the match.
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Club Brugge have a goal kick.
Charles De Ketelaere puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Clinton Mata with an assist there.
Throw-in for Club Brugge in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a Club Brugge throw-in in Genk's half.
In Genk Club Brugge drive forward through Mats Rits. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Club Brugge have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Ball safe as Club Brugge is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mats Moller Daehli (Genk) strikes at Luminus Arena but his header is cleared.
Junya Ito grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Luminus Arena.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Erik Lambrechts awards the away team a throw-in.
Club Brugge to take a throw-in in Genk territory.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Club Brugge's half?
Corner awarded to Genk.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sebastien Dewaest.
Sebastien Dewaest for Genk is back on the field again.
Genk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Club Brugge get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genk's half?
Free kick for Club Brugge in their own half.
Throw-in for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Genk to take a throw-in in Club Brugge territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Genk close to the penalty box.
Club Brugge will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Genk.
Throw-in Genk.
Free kick Club Brugge.
Erik Lambrechts signals a Genk throw-in in Club Brugge's half.
Corner awarded to Club Brugge.
Club Brugge push upfield and Mats Rits gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Genk defence.
Free kick for Club Brugge in their own half.
The match at Luminus Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Charles De Ketelaere, who is down injured.
Club Brugge are whistled for offside.
Charles De Ketelaere returns to the field for Club Brugge after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Club Brugge in the half of Genk.
Throw-in high up the field for Club Brugge in Genk.
Throw-in for Club Brugge in the half of Genk.
Club Brugge have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
Genk pushes forward through Theo Bongonda, whose finish on goal is saved.
Club Brugge awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Genk in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Club Brugge!
Erik Lambrechts awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Club Brugge.
Throw-in for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk.
Genk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Club Brugge.
Free kick Club Brugge.
Can Genk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Club Brugge's half?
Goal kick for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Ball safe as Club Brugge is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Club Brugge's Charles De Ketelaere is whistled for offside at Luminus Arena.
Throw-in for Genk in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk just outside Club Brugge's area.
Junya Ito of Genk smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Genk.
The first-half is over at Luminus Arena.
The second half has started at Luminus Arena.
Ball safe as Club Brugge is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
The away team replace Percy Tau with Siebe Schrijvers.
Genk needs to be cautious. Club Brugge have an attacking throw-in.
Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Club Brugge in their own half.
Erik Lambrechts awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Club Brugge.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Erik Lambrechts awards the away team a throw-in.
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the home team.
So close for Club Brugge as Siebe Schrijvers's shot comes back off the post.
Erik Lambrechts signals a throw-in for Club Brugge, close to Genk's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Genk goal kick.
Ball safe as Genk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a Club Brugge throw-in in Genk's half.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
Free kick for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Kristian Thorstvedt (Genk) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Club Brugge defenders.
Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Club Brugge's half?
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hannes Wolf is making the team's first substitution at Luminus Arena with Stephen Odey replacing Mats Moller Daehli.
Genk to take a throw-in in Club Brugge territory.
Erik Lambrechts signals a Club Brugge throw-in in Genk's half.
Throw-in Club Brugge.
Genk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Charles De Ketelaere (Club Brugge) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Krepin Diatta (Club Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Genk in their own half.
Dries Wouters (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Genk are in shooting range from this free kick.
Clinton Mata is booked for the away team.
Genk's Junya Ito gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Club Brugge defender.
Free kick Club Brugge.
Free kick for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Throw-in for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Club Brugge awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Club Brugge get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genk's half?
Throw-in for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Erik Lambrechts awards Club Brugge a goal kick.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk.
At Luminus Arena, Eder Balanta has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Genk's Theo Bongonda gets in a shot on goal at Luminus Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Club Brugge.
Kouassi Eboue (Genk) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
Club Brugge are caught offside.
Erik Lambrechts awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Michael Krmencik is replacing Charles De Ketelaere for the away team.
Throw-in Club Brugge.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genk.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Genk drives forward and Kristian Thorstvedt gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Genk have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Genk to take a throw-in in Club Brugge territory.
Throw-in for Genk close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Club Brugge is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Club Brugge in their own half.
Mats Rits for Club Brugge drives towards goal at Luminus Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Club Brugge have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
In Genk Club Brugge attack through Michael Krmencik. The finish is off target, however.
Genk have a goal kick.
Hannes Wolf (Genk) is making a second substitution, with Bryan Limbombe replacing Theo Bongonda.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Corner awarded to Genk.
Club Brugge awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Club Brugge.
Genk's Bryan Limbombe is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Genk in their own half.
David Okereke is replacing Krepin Diatta for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
Throw-in for Genk in the half of Club Brugge.
Can Genk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Club Brugge's half?
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Club Brugge in their own half.
Club Brugge awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Genk in their own half.
Free kick Genk.
In Genk a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Genk push forward at Luminus Arena and Bryan Limbombe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Club Brugge defence.
Genk have been awarded a corner by Erik Lambrechts.
Goal! Mats Rits heads Club Brugge into a 1-2 lead.
Great play from David Okereke to set up the goal.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Patrik Hrosovsky (Genk) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal kick for Club Brugge at Luminus Arena.
In Genk Club Brugge's Siebe Schrijvers is caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Club Brugge goal kick.
Erik Lambrechts signals a free kick to Genk in their own half.
Genk awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Joseph Paintsil is on a sub for Dries Wouters for Genk.
Eduard Sobol (Club Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
